Key Match Events: England won the toss and elected to field against India in the T20 World Cup 2022 semi-final at Adelaide Oval.
India finished top of Group 2 with 8 points in 5 matches and a net run rate of 1.319.
England finished second in Group 1 with 7 points in 5 matches and a net run rate of 0.473.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts noted that no team who has elected to bat first on the Adelaide grounds has gone on to win the match.
This is the first time India and England will play a T20I match on Australian grounds.
Miscellaneous Highlights: If rain disrupts the play and also the reserve day, India will move into the finals of the T20 World Cup 2022 by virtue of their position in their group’s points table.
